response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would also bring significant benefits to you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $1,200,000, considering its worth to you is estimated at $800,000. We hope this proposal aligns well with your expectations and financial considerations. Please let us know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. We look forward to potentially welcoming you as our esteemed client.", "product_price": 1200000}
